en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each [Enhanced Fire Att., Enhanced Wood Att.] awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: ルインコマンド
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の火と木属性強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: 루인 커맨드
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 불과 나무속성 강화의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승

na_skill.name: Ruin Command
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Enhanced Fire, Wood Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
